children.text: Matrix Addition: \((A + B)_{ij} = A_{ij} + B_{ij}\). Properties: \(A + B = B + A\) (commutative), \((A + B) + C = A + (B + C)\) (associative), \(A + O = A\) where O is null matrix.
Matrix Multiplication: \((AB)_{ij} = \sum_{k=1}^{n} A_{ik}B_{kj}\). Properties: \((AB)C = A(BC)\), \(A(B + C) = AB + AC\), \(AI = IA = A\) where I is identity matrix. Generally \(AB \neq BA\).
Transpose Properties: \((A^T)^T = A\), \((A + B)^T = A^T + B^T\), \((AB)^T = B^T A^T\), \((kA)^T = kA^T\). Symmetric matrix: \(A^T = A\). Skew-symmetric: \(A^T = -A\).

Determinant of 2×2 Matrix: \(\begin{vmatrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{vmatrix} = ad - bc\). Determinant of 3×3 Matrix: \(\begin{vmatrix} a_1 & b_1 & c_1 \\ a_2 & b_2 & c_2 \\ a_3 & b_3 & c_3 \end{vmatrix} = a_1(b_2c_3 - b_3c_2) - b_1(a_2c_3 - a_3c_2) + c_1(a_2b_3 - a_3b_2)\).
Determinant Properties: \(\det(AB) = \det(A) \det(B)\), \(\det(A^T) = \det(A)\), \(\det(kA) = k^n \det(A)\) for n×n matrix. If any row/column is zero, \(\det(A) = 0\).
Cofactor and Adjoint: Cofactor \(C_{ij} = (-1)^{i+j} M_{ij}\) where \(M_{ij}\) is minor. Adjoint \(\text{adj}(A) = [C_{ij}]^T\). Property: \(A \cdot \text{adj}(A) = \det(A) \cdot I\).
Cramer's Rule: For system \(AX = B\), solution is \(x_i = \frac{\det(A_i)}{\det(A)}\) where \(A_i\) is matrix A with i-th column replaced by B. Valid when \(\det(A) \neq 0\).
Rank of Matrix: Rank is maximum number of linearly independent rows/columns. \(\text{rank}(A) = \text{rank}(A^T)\), \(\text{rank}(AB) \leq \min(\text{rank}(A), \text{rank}(B))\).

Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors: For \(AX = \lambda X\), \(\lambda\) is eigenvalue and X is eigenvector. Characteristic equation: \(\det(A - \lambda I) = 0\). Sum of eigenvalues = trace of A, product = determinant of A.
